sorcer.service
Interface Service

All Known Subinterfaces:
AsyncExertion, Exertion, GroupManagement, Jobber, MonitoredExertion, Outer, Partner, Provider, RemotePartner, SorcerNotifierProtocol, Spacer, Tasker
All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseProvider, DataSpaceProvider, ExertMonitor, IfExertion, Job, NetJob, NetTask, ObjectJob, ObjectTask, RemoteLoggerManager, ServiceCataloger, ServiceExertion, ServiceJobber, ServiceProvider, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker, SignedServiceTask, Task, WhileExertion
public interface Service

An top-level common interface for all service peers in SORCER. Each servicer accepts a request for Exertion to exert the federation of collaborating services.

Author:
Mike Sobolewski

Method Summary
 Exertion service(Exertion exertion)
           
 Exertion service(Exertion exertion, Transaction txn)
          A generic service request as specified by an exertion - a generic service message.
 

Method Detail

service

Exertion service(Exertion exertion,
                 Transaction txn)
                 throws TransactionException,
                        ExertionException,
                        RemoteException
A generic service request as specified by an exertion - a generic service message. It can be carried out dynamically and indirectly by any Service peer and directly by a Service matching the exertion's method Signature.

Parameters:
exertion - an input exertion
txn - The transaction (if any) under which to provide service.
Returns:
a resulting exertion
Throws:
TransactionException - if a transaction error occurs
ExertionException - if an exertion invocation failed for any reason
RemoteException

service

Exertion service(Exertion exertion)
                 throws TransactionException,
                        ExertionException,
                        RemoteException
Throws:
TransactionException
ExertionException
RemoteException
